metadata.title: CVE-2024-5689 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In addition to detecting when a user was taking a screenshot (XXX), awebsite was able to overlay the 'My Shots' button that appeared, and directthe user to a replica Firefox Screenshots page that could be used forphishing. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 127.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
